objective: Optimize the sales funnel and offer positioning for Acusio Bivona, The Resurrection Coach. He sells a $10K 90-day body-led OS reset ('The Rebuild') for male executives (35-55, $150K+) who succeed externally but feel empty/numb. Bridge offer: 'The Intensive' ($4,997, 30-day proof-of-concept, credits toward The Rebuild). 4 archetypes: Hollow Emperor, Exhausted Operator, Fading Titan, Isolated Builder. Core method: body-first (sleep, nervous system, movement) BEFORE mindset. NOT therapy, NOT crisis coaching — executive biological optimization. DELIVERABLES: (1) Apply your Oversubscribed methodology to The Rebuild and The Intensive — create waitlist mechanics, scarcity framework, and demand-signaling tactics. (2) Design a scorecard/assessment funnel that qualifies prospects while building desire. (3) Recommend a Campaign Driving Activity (CDA) for LinkedIn that drives qualified inbound. (4) Strategic recommendations for positioning the offers as exclusive, not accessible.
